import CartExcursions from "./CartExcursions"; import Button from "./Button.js"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import "./styling/CartCSS.css" const Cart = ({ booking, excursionList, bookingIndex, excursionIndex }) => { (

Cart

{booking[bookingIndex].bookingFName} {booking[bookingIndex].bookingLName}

Subtotal: ${booking[bookingIndex].cost}.00

{/* put this in the same form as the input and make an onclick function */}
) } export default Cart const enableCompletion =(Style)=>{ document.getElementsByClassName(Style).disabled = "false"; }
